channel.title: How do you change the words for ur npcs and stuff like that?
channel.description:
i need to find out how to change wat the npcs say and how to chaneg like wat the maxhit thing says for irvinpkscape v1 if u help he and it work ill make u admin on my server :D thanks!
or email it to me at wazzuphommieg3@yahoo.com thanks again!

item.title: How do you change the words for ur npcs and stuff like that?
item.dc:creator: @the_fiz the fiz
item.description:
@the_fiz wrote:

right click on the npc and it will say the code for that npc

like 552

go into your server files and open npc handler

do ctrl and f

put code of npc and it would be saying “weclome to blablabla”

chage that to what ever you whant it to say!

Read full topic
